paper.title: Research on Credit Risk Recognizing Model in Enterprises of Credit-sale
paper.abstract: In this paper, by Logit regression technology, we construct a model for recognizing and warning credit risk based on financial and non-financial Ratios. The test's resualt show that the accuracy of the model is up to 86.6%.Obversely, it can offer enterprise some supports for recognizing and warning credit risk in credit sale.

domain_result.justification: 该论文通过Logit回归技术构建了一个用于识别和预警信用风险的模型，这直接应用于金融风险管理中的信用风险管理领域。
